jcr:content.jcr:description: Code Signing for Adobe AIR. Code signing certificates are digital certificates that will help protect users from downloading compromised files or applications.

containercomponent.desc:
Beyond the desktop: True security for code in a mobile world.
Authenticate that your Adobe AIR content is safe to download. Comply with adobe requirements.

carousel.desc: [The Apache Software Foundation turned to Symantec for cloud-based code signing and SSL certificate management solutions. The results: streamlined\, secure code-signing access for 4\,000 developers across 6 continents\, minimized risk\, and on-demand SSL certificates in minutes instead of days.,Brand protection is a top priority for ebay. The company implemented a large portfolio of Symantec security solutions for everything from data loss prevention\, to endpoint security\, to managed security\, to encryption technologies.]
